channel.title: Need help! just 1 little thing!
channel.description:
i get this error:
[code]
client.java:20281: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerIndex location: class client client castOnPlayer = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex];
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprcated API. Note: Recompiler with -Xlint:deprcation for deatails. 1 error Finished! Press and key to continue . . .
[/code]
how do i make this work? i have tried making it just
[code]
client castOnPlayer = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex];
[/code]
but it gives me 2 more errors, so i changed it.
This is very annoying because i cannot do anything until this is fixed!!!! :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:
